theme_caption.[0, 2, 4, 6, 11, 51]: Hiking on Huashan Mountain. This theme captures the initial stages of the adventure, with various groups and individuals exploring the narrow paths and enjoying scenic views.
theme_caption.[76, 98, 154, 160]: Thrilling Mountain Climbing. This theme represents the peak of the adventure, showcasing climbers tackling steep cliffs and using safety equipment, emphasizing the thrill and challenge.
theme_caption.[166, 168, 185, 190, 208, 222, 233, 235,: Navigating Cliffside Paths. This theme focuses on the careful navigation and safety measures taken by hikers and climbers as they traverse narrow and challenging mountain paths.

story_result.global_caption: The video collection presents an adventurous journey on Huashan Mountain, beginning with scenes of hikers exploring narrow paths and enjoying breathtaking views. As the adventure unfolds, the focus shifts to more challenging cliffside paths and the use of safety equipment, highlighting the thrill and camaraderie among the groups. The climax features climbers tackling steep cliffs, showcasing the excitement and teamwork involved in this thrilling mountain adventure.
